geese.name: Poster Goose
geese.description: This goose is the first one who appears if you google 'goose' so it gets to be here
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Angry Fellow
geese.description: You have dared to approach this rather rotund fellow, you will regret such an endeavour
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: The Calm One
geese.description: Even in the most fiery of situations, this goose will remain perfectly calm. One could say he is based.
geese.author: Somebody with a long name

geese.name: Evil Eye
geese.description: Once you make eye contact, you are locked in this goose's eerie gaze for the short remainder of your lifetime as it rapidly approaches you
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Banana
geese.description: He is banan
geese.author: Somebody with a long name

geese.name: Goose Bong
geese.description: Get stoned in style with this goose themed bong
geese.author: Somebody with a long name

geese.name: Gangsta Goose
geese.description: This absolute G has arms and isn't afraid to use them
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Scott
geese.description: So anyway, he started blasting
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: The Sphere
geese.description: The Sphere is able to instantly incapacitate all enemies by way of an attack similar to Sonic's dash.
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Pegagoose
geese.description: We ride at dawn
geese.author: Somebody with a long name

geese.name: Untitled Goose
geese.description: Peace was never an option
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: The Twins
geese.description: Double the geese, double the honking.
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Dogthroater
geese.description: This goose will reach down your throat and steal your internal organs. The motive is unknown.
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Plural Banana
geese.description: the banan return in greater numbers
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: The Goosciples
geese.description: These geese are completely dedicated to The Goose Lord (pictured, 1st from top, third from right), and will submit to his will, no matter what it is
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: The Classy Ones
geese.description: The Classy Ones are the fanciest geese in town. They look down upon you, as an inferior peasant.
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: HitGoose
geese.description: It's nothing personal.
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: The Ascender
geese.description: This goose will ascend from the murky depths and grab his victims, before taking them back down where they are never seen again.
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Mr Grin
geese.description: you know he had to do it to 'em
geese.author: Somebody with a long name

geese.name: Incognito Mode
geese.description: These geese are always watching from the shadows, recording your browsing history...
geese.author: Somebody with a long name

geese.name: Level 5 Goose Warning
geese.description: The goose in this image cannot be seen. However, this sign clearly shows the danger this goose represents.
geese.author: Somebody with a long name

geese.name: Another Banana
geese.description: The amount of photos of geese involving bananas is surprisingly high.
geese.author: Somebody with a long name

geese.name: The Thief
geese.description: Look away for even a second and your posessions will vanish into the night
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Goosed
geese.description: This goose has had a few too many and will probably regret it in the morning
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Goose Jockey
geese.description: This goose has invested in a personal defence system in the form of a cat who will ride wherever she goes
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Domestigoose
geese.description: She is dedicated to her goose and her goose is dedicated to her
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Close and Personal
geese.description: Contrary to what you may believe, this goose is not looking at the camera, as their eyes are on the side of their heads.
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Craned
geese.description: This goose has its neck in what seems to be an uncomfortable position.
geese.author: The Goose Lord

geese.name: Satisfied
geese.description: The goose in this picture is just happy to see you.
geese.author: The Goose Lord

geese.name: Australian
geese.description: G'day mate. Honk.
geese.author: Pr0x1mas

geese.name: Socks
geese.description: Now you too can have geese on your feet.
geese.author: Pr0x1mas
